description: The initiative focuses on a large-scale partnership involving 395 legal partners, 776 commercial producers, and 1,200 beneficiary families. It emphasizes sustainable practices, including solar energy and biofuel drying systems, and promotes female leadership. The organization aims to enhance education within the community, ensuring members can pursue higher education. Additionally, it seeks to establish a global presence in organic cocoa production while addressing challenges like climate change and illegal mining in the region.
name: Kallari
